messages.subject: Re: vaccination documentation
messages.msgSnippet: ... Notice that your friend is just following the mainstream thinking? (Don t take drugs while pregnant, vaccinate kids) Maybe she is just one of the people
messages.messageBody:
--- In unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com, Sharissa13 <sharissa13@...>
wrote:
> I have a friend who's a
> nursing student, pregnant, and dead-set on
> vaccinations. She won't take any sort of medication
> during her pregnancy, but insists that it's the best
> thing to vaccinate her infant when it's born.
>
Notice that your friend is just following the mainstream thinking?
(Don't take drugs while pregnant, vaccinate kids) Maybe she is just one
of the people that the goverment likes that does not question things.
Perhaps she has really thought it out and came to this conclusion, but
maybe not!

messages.subject: vaccination documentation
messages.msgSnippet: There was a huge discussion recently on here about vaccinations and a lot of books and sources were given for why not to vaccinate. I have a friend who s a
messages.messageBody:
There was a huge discussion recently on here about
vaccinations and a lot of books and sources were given
for why not to vaccinate. I have a friend who's a
nursing student, pregnant, and dead-set on
vaccinations. She won't take any sort of medication
during her pregnancy, but insists that it's the best
thing to vaccinate her infant when it's born.

That being said, I was wondering if people could send
me the names of those books and things so i can pass
them on to my friend. I've gotten her to the point
that she's actually willing to read a little about it. Thanks!
